text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump While he is there he will forgo wearing a mask , he will say mean things about Michigan and her people and take a few swipes at the Governor. He will then blame the flood and the #Coronavirus on Obama. #Desperate #Unfit #ElectionSlippingAway
